title: Verify Locate button replacement in browser

changes.description: Added hiddenLocateButton property to store reference to hidden Locate button; Added hideLocateButton() method to find and hide the original Locate button using closest('nde-location') and querySelector('button.getit-locate-button'); Added showLocateButton() method to restore the Locate button's display; Called hideLocateButton() when shouldShow becomes true in checkShouldShow(); Called showLocateButton() in ngOnDestroy for proper cleanup
Changed :host display from 'block' to 'inline-block' and removed padding to match the Locate button's positioning; Updated comments to reflect that the button replaces the Locate button
